member.name: M:Icarus_Drone_Service_App.MainWindow.#ctor

member.summary: 6.10: Validates that only contains digits and up to two decimal places. Prevents negative input.

member.name: M:Icarus_Drone_Service_App.MainWindow.GetServicePriority
member.summary: 6.7: Returns the currently selected service priority.
member.returns: “Express” if the express radio button is checked; otherwise “Regular”.

member.summary: No‐op handler so the XAML Checked event can point here without surcharge.

member.summary: Updates the control to show the next available tag.

member.summary: 6.8,6.9,6.2–6.4: Rebinds all three collection views: Regular, Express, and Finished.

member.summary: 6.5,6.6,6.17: Handles the Add New Item / Save Changes button click. Validates all fields, applies 15% surcharge for express on enqueue, and then clears the form and refreshes views.

member.name: T:Icarus_Drone_Service_App.Models.Drone
member.summary: Represents a single drone service request, including client, model, tag, problem description, cost, and priority.

member.name: P:Icarus_Drone_Service_App.Models.Drone.ClientName
member.summary: Gets or sets the client’s name, formatted as Title Case.

member.name: P:Icarus_Drone_Service_App.Models.Drone.DroneModel
member.summary: Gets or sets the drone model identifier.

member.name: P:Icarus_Drone_Service_App.Models.Drone.ServiceTag
member.summary: Gets or sets the numeric service tag (100–900).

member.name: P:Icarus_Drone_Service_App.Models.Drone.ServiceProblem
member.summary: Gets or sets the problem description, formatted in Sentence Case.

member.name: P:Icarus_Drone_Service_App.Models.Drone.ServiceCost
member.summary: Gets or sets the service cost, automatically rounded to two decimals.

member.name: P:Icarus_Drone_Service_App.Models.Drone.ServicePriority
member.summary: Gets or sets the priority: “Regular” or “Express”.

member.name: M:Icarus_Drone_Service_App.Models.Drone.Display
member.summary: Returns a single-line string summarizing all fields of this Drone.
member.returns: A formatted string containing Tag, Client, Model, Problem, Cost, and Priority.
